Service & Outreach

  • DiscovOR (2023)
    • Provide high school students with an overview idea of what Operations Research is and familiarize them with key concepts, such as randomness in real-world decision-making, queuing systems, and simulation. By doing so, the program seeks to spark studentsâ€™ imagination and instill a passion for STEM fields, paving the way for the future generation of problem solvers.
